title: "They Built it" (Person of Interest)(1 x 22)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: “Someone really built the damn thing” - I get goosebumps.
That "Oh my god, they actually built it" gives me chills every time.
This scene was so fucking good. NSA probably got nightmares watching it. Or ideas 🤨
This dude would’ve became Edward Snowden...
description:
Peck realizes what the government has built.
